title: Go Online Version Switch Case Incorrect Behavior
body:
by **NeilOwensEmail**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Using the go tour code page 41,
 http://play.golang.org/p/qyA0FiooEr

2. Executed on a Thursday

3. Edited code to include a newline. 
http://play.golang.org/p/Fjgt7-lBtM

4. Executed again

What is the expected output?
2. "In two days."
4. "In two days."

What do you see instead?
2. "Too far away."
4. "In two days."

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
Go playground and Go Tour.

Which operating system are you using?
Windows 7, Chrome 17

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
weekly.2012-03-13
According to runtime.Version()

Please provide any additional information below.
Makes switch case behavior very hard to understand if the tour explaining it is broken.
